subtitle: Private Browsing & Payments Tunnel
privacyDrawerIntro: Privxx helps reduce metadata exposure — such as IP address, location, and timing — while you browse or interact online.
privacyDrawerIntroPreview: This preview demonstrates how private routing will feel once fully enabled.
privacySectionDesignedPoint2: Make private routing feel simple and familiar
privacySectionBrowsingText: When you connect through Privxx, your web requests are routed through a privacy network that removes identifying metadata. This prevents tracking based on IP address, location, or browsing patterns.
privacySectionPaymentsText: Privxx separates your identity from your transactions. Whether you're connecting to a merchant or a payment endpoint, Privxx prevents observers from linking payments back to you.
privacySectionNotPoint1: Make claims beyond what is currently active
privacySectionStatusText: This version of Privxx demonstrates the connection flow and interface. Full cryptographic routing via cMixx will be integrated next.
proxyPlaceholder: Proxied content will appear here in a future version.
demoModeNotice: Demo mode — secure routing simulated for preview
errorConnectionFailed: Unable to establish a private route right now.
